32000032 // 002a start       LW,0        dwaddr     ; Loads the contents of location X'24' (X'11') into private memory register 0
4c000001 // 002b             SIO,0       1          ; Write to IOP0, device 1 (console)
02200090 // 002c             LCFI,2      0x90
4c000001 // 002d             SIO,0       1          ; Write to IOP0, device 1 (console)
2e000000 // 002e             WAIT,0      0
00000000
010000cc // 0030 siodw       GEN,32      0x01000000 | (message << 2) ; Bits 0 through 31 of I/O command doubleword. Specifies write order (01) and starting byte location.
020000ff // 0031             GEN,32      0x020000FF ; No flags, suppress incorrect length. X'FF' specifies writing up to 255 bytes
00000018 // 0032 dwaddr      GEN,32      siodw>>1
134d6963 // 0033 message     TEXTC       "Microcode-NG here.\n"
726f636f
64652d4e
47206865
72652e0a
